ProjectTitle: Innovative point-of-care molecular diagnostics for surveillance and targeted control of schistosomiasis and malaria in the Democratic Republic of Congo based on environmental DNA
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/05/2024
The content of your DMP is good, BOF however requests a DMP written using the Flemish DMP template where more details are asked. You can find more information and the template here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp. You can also find the template in DMPonline.be by selecting KU Leuven as primary research organisation and checking the box "No funder associated with this plan or my funder is not listed"
label: good with suggestions
